name: Bluelux
0:
”Alexa, turn off all lights”
”Alexa, dim kitchen lights”
”Alexa, turn on air conditioner”
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Developer Terms of Use
des:
With the Bluelux skill, Alexa can turn your lights on and or off, change their brightness and control your appliances too.

You will need a Bluelux Bridge already connected to your Bluelux lighting and home appliances. You must have a Bluelux device and a Bluelux account to use this skill.

Supported Devices: Bluelux Pro, Bluelux Dimmer, Bluelux LED Strip, Bluelux Switch, Bluelux Switch 04 Channels, Bluelux Infrared.

To get started, enable the skill and start the Account Linking process, which will connect your Bluelux account with the skill. The Account Linking process will direct you to the Bluelux login page. After logging in to your Bluelux account, you should choose the location you want to sync with the skill and accept. Back to the Alexa app, start discovery to sync your devices.
